description: Watchtower parking lot, not necessarily glamorous but calm night (a bit of traffic in the evening for the sunset), more space than on the other watchtower. well in troubleshooting. no ban, a few houses around

title_short: (07180) Calvià - 4 Carretera el T Carretera Magaluf-S. Ponsa

address.street: 4 Carretera el T Carretera Magaluf-S. Ponsa

title: (07180) Santa Ponça - 45A Via Creu
description: Very good views of the port of Santa Ponsa and the whole bay, quiet place

title: (07180) Calvià - 3 Avenida Magaluf-s.ponça/n.s.ponsa
description: Very cool place with pine trees near the beach see you on the road martifurgo 2

title: (07190) Banyalbufar - Ma-10
description: At the edge of the ma10, km n84 in front of the milestone, shaded area, quiet. The cars on the road are few at night, and we spent 2 night very quiet, cool. Small waste collection before leaving, it's clean for the next. Be careful when entering, small drop to pass slowly.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - Ma-10
description: Nice place to sleep, high up in the neck, with great views. Room for 2-3 vans. There is a small natural wall that prevents you from being seen from the road and prevents noise.

title: (07190) Son Coll -
description: Beautiful spot with a view for a van. In a curve of a lonely street.

title: (07180) El Toro - 7 Carrer Gran Via
description: Municipal parking 50 meters from the beach playa del toro

title: (07170) Valldemossa - Ma-1131
description: 1 flat and one sloping for van by the roadside. At the foot of the climbing routes and with a breathtaking view of the sea and the port of Valdemossa. Tourist traffic during the day.

title: (07192) Estellencs - 30B Carrer de sa Síquia
description: It is a washhouse fed by a mountain spring.

title: (07110) Bunyola - Ma-2100
description: Small dirt road, close to a bend. Narrow access, just wide enough for a van. After 25m, the path makes a loop around a tree and we stayed there for 1 night. Flat, calm, a few vehicles and cyclists passing on the small road next to it.

title: (07180) Santa Ponça - 6 Calle Platja /el Toro
description: Parking in front of the Puerto Adriano beach. quiet and flat place. two steps from the water. to sleep in front of the sea that I like.

title: (07180) El Toro - 3 Carrer Platja
description: Surely crowded in high season, but allowed us to take our first shower after 4 days;)

title: (07609) Llucmajor - 3 Carrer d'Orió
description: We slept the night practically alone in the camper, it is a huge parking lot, with endless views of the sea and towards Palma de Mallorca. We arrived at sunset and enjoyed the solarium that is down a little from the parking lot, right at the foot of the water, where there were people practicing snorkeling. Beautiful to sleep with the sound of the sea.

title: (07192) Estellencs - 4 Diseminado Carretera al Puerto
description: Quiet and secluded parking, ideal to spend the day in low season. A bit narrow entrance, but we have entered with a 7m motorhome.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 16 Diseminado Palma Cr
description: Car park for the Cami de Baix hike

title: (07170) Valldemossa - Carrer Tramuntana
description: The port of Valldemossa has a very quiet parking lot at night. Very pleasant place a few meters from the water. Very difficult access for a motorhome over 7 m and 2.30 m high, almost impossible crossing and maneuvering in all the hairpins.!!

title: (07330) Consell - 1003 Carrer de Masnou
description:
Parking next to the sports center, possibility of enjoying the swimming pool and bathrooms by paying a ticket in summer.
good parking place to visit the town.

title: (07192) Estellencs - 8 Diseminado Carretera a Andratx
description: Perfect view of the sea and the mountains! You can probably park here doing the night. Just next to the road. It will probably fit around six motorhomes.

title: (07160) Calvià - 864 Carrer 864
description: The parking lot is quite flat and very quiet and is about 300 m from the beach, from the Boulevard de Paguera, where there are shops and restaurants.

title: (07191) - 2 Ma-10
description: Big parking spot for 6-8 cars/vans under the trees which provides a shadow from sun. Very nice and calm spot for campers to sleep over or just to park and have a lunch. Nice sea view, but it's close to the main road

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 11 Camí des Molí
description: Here is a small shaded parking for vehicles (such as ours) that can not go down to the lower spot :-) We had a quiet night. Be careful not to arrive too late because the car park is full at night (many hotels). We were at the far end of the car park and had the chance to have a place close to a tree and suddenly a little room to take our meals outside, without disturbing the parking of other vehicles.

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 3 Diseminado Estellencs Cr
description: Very large ground parking, with some trees, although they are small, they provide shade. Bañalbufar beach is small and made of stones. To get there you have to walk through the town and go down the streets for 15 minutes. It is a very curious cove!

title: (07160) Peguera - 1 Carrer de la Mimosa
description:
17 kg , dryer 17 kg 


 4 parking now 20 10.22 free but basically blue zone

title: (07191) Banyalbufar - 134 Cami Sa Pedra de s'Ase
title_short: (07191) Banyalbufar - 134 Cami Sa Pedra de s'Ase
description: Torre del Verger parking area. Old watchtower with a viewpoint. Very quiet at night. In summer busy during the day, in winter quiet day and night. Spectacular views of the coast. There is a path down to a small stone cove. Do not go down with vehicles, the path is very narrow and steep.

title: (07170) Valldemossa - 5 Carrer Ermita Joan Mir
description: Very narrow road, you can pass by car or van. very quiet parking we have spent the night great, there are bathrooms and stone tables for picnic

title: (07192) Estellenchs - 42 Diseminado Carretera al Mar
description: Small dirt parking one minute from the pebble beach. Very narrow road to reach it and often impossible for illegally parked cars, not recommended for large vans and at peak times.

title: (07160) Calvià - 437 Carrer 866
description: Empty car park. I was here on a Sunday. Not sure what it’s used for. Height restriction on entry. My van is 2.7M and was good. Over night looks good also. I may not stay overnight however. Many spaces and some good shade spots for summer sun.

title: (07150) Andratx - 2T Carrer S'estanyera
description: Free parking lot with lots of light

title: (07330) Consell - 66 Diseminado Poligono 1
description: Picnic area with tables and shade. Parking next door

title: (07160) Cala Fornells - 80 Carretera de Cala Fornells
title_short: (07160) Cala Fornells - 80 Carretera de Cala Fornells
description: Very calm pine forest, by the sea. Cala Fornells

title: (07192) Estellencs - 15 Diseminado Carretera a Andratx
description: Parking area next to the road with space for about 8 caravans, shade of some pine trees, sea views (from afar). Nearby restaurant and shop where to buy some utensils.

title: (07192) Estellencs - 15 Diseminado Carretera a Andratx
description: Very nice place to have a nice view and rest some time!

title: (07150) Andratx - 3 Carrer Son Bosch
description: Ample parking to park for free throughout the day and spend the night. Behind the Town Hall and next to the Mercadona

title: (07150) Andratx - 17 Carrer Madrid
description: Very spacious place where you can park day and night. Place of sand and gravel, without services, with shadows. Five minutes walk from downtown and with a Mercadona for shopping very close. There are four esplanades including one very illuminated. Very quiet neighborhood, ideal for sleeping.

title: (07150) Andratx - 14 Polígon Son Mas
description: Public water fountain at the end of a walkway with a park in the middle

title: (07340) Alaró - 30 Plaça Clastra de son Togores
title_short: (07340) Alaró - 30 Plaça Clastra de son Togores
description: Public parking in Alaró, it is usually quite full

title: (07150) Andratx - 1 Diseminado Palma Cr
description: Parking next to water station. During the week traffic by water truck. On Saturday, little on Sunday / holiday nothing! Supermarket and petrol station 1 km away. Mega quiet at night, direct access to hiking area and climbing area

title: (07179) Deià - 34E Carrer Arxiduc Luís Salvador
description: Parking on the road entering Deià. Comfortable to spend the night.

title: (07150) Andratx - 73 Calle General Bernardo Riera
description: Cemetery parking lot. Be careful, at the bottom, there is a passing road, it can make a little noise. Possibility of taking water from the cemetery tap. No service.

title: (07179) - 23C Carrer Arxiduc Luís Salvador
description: Parking at the entrance of Deià, without services but comfortable and accessible. There is room for about 10-12 cars. Quiet at night.

title: (07179) Deià - 5 Carrer Es Clot
description: Possibility of showering with hot water in the Can Boi refuge for a fee. Good service and attention.

title: (07160) Andratx - 192A Urbanització Porto Mar
description: Very quiet parking separated from the road next to the golf course of Camp de Mar.

title: (07160) - 192A Urbanizacion Porto de Mar
description: Free parking next to the Camp de Mar Golf Course. Very spacious and large land parking.

title: (07143) Biniali - 22 Carrer Molino
description: Very large parking lot in the small town of Biniali.

title: (07160) Andratx - 193 Urbanització Porto Mar
description: Free public parking day and night. Very quiet area next to the beach. In the summer season, during the day it is difficult to find a place, at night it is easier.

title: (07340) Alaró - 70 Ma-2100
description: Free parking, easy access, without services. Good option to spend a night.

title: (07160) Andratx - 152 Urbanització Porto Mar
description: Small free parking day and night. Very quiet area and close to the beach. It is made of gravel and has pine trees that provide shade.

title: (07179) Deià - 1A Carretera Sóller
description: Parking on the road. 4 spaces very close to Deià some inclination

title: (07179) Deià - 13 Diseminado Valldemossa Cr
description: This place is just right next to the starting point if you are planning for a walk to “Sa Foradada”. Even you are not planning for the walk, you have to come and see the amazing subset just 1 min walk from here. There is a bar next and public toilet. Plenty of space for parking (enough for around 30 cars). At night most of the cars left so it is quiet and perfect to sleep.

title: (07150) Andratx - Camí de sa Torre Nova
title_short: (07150) Andratx - Camí de sa Torre Nova
description: Bivouac area with magnificent viewpoint. Recommended for 4x4s and mini van cars to maneuver on tracks. Ultra calm, far from it all. Just magic!

title: (07179) Deià - 6 Diseminado Valldemossa Cr
description:
Small parking in nature for the most part along the quietest route on the road that leads to deia cove.
Accesa be a little Tricky, Good turning possibility

title: (07179) Deià - 8 Carrer Francisco Mas
description: Parking very close to Deia. Perfect to go to dinner to the people taking a walk. In the morning if you get up early you can go down to the cove, where you can also spend the night. Very careful with the size of your vehicle that people park next to the road of the cove and the exit and entry is very complicated. Better to enter and leave at the first or last hour.

title: (07349) Bunyola - 15 Carretera Orient-Alaró
description: Almost flat esplanade to see Orient and surroundings without services

title: (07350) Binissalem - 100 Carrer del Conquistador
description: Very big place, good to visit the city

title: (07179) Deià - 5 Carrer Sa Cala
description: Parking at Cala Deia, possible to stay overnight, free from 7 p.m. to 9 a.m., great to be the last in the water and the first in the morning !!

title: (07150) Andratx - Ma-10
description: Very large space, with tables but no barbecues, very busy during the day but empty at night. Camping is not allowed but parking is allowed.

title: (07350) Binissalem - 26H Carrer de sa Mostra
description: Parking.

title: (07210) Algaida - 12 Carrer sa Serradora
description: center car park

title: (07620) - 190 Lugar Poligono 11
description:
We offer the land of our house for camping travelers. It is a flat and spacious land with some large carob trees.
We have a large pool, children's trampoline and access to bathroom with shower.
We are 5 minutes from the town of Llucmajor and 30 minutes from the capital, Palma.
Ask for availability

title: (07160) Andratx - 6 Camí Cala Blanca
description: Beautiful secluded parking above a beautiful beach, fast before they build

title: (07160) Andratx - 1U Camí Cala Blanca
description: Nature corner with sea view, overlooking Cala Blanca (and a natural parking space where you can also spend the night further down the road). Easy access. Room for several vans or motorhomes, rather clean. Beautiful view of the sea when you wake up

title: (07210) Algaida - 111 Diseminado es Porrassar
description: Parking lot on the outskirts of Algaida, quiet area,

title: (07350) Binissalem - 40 Carrer de Gaspar Vallès
description: Only short vehicles. It is the parking lot of the train station. unpaved but flat

title: (07350) Binissalem - 60 Diseminado Poligono 15
description: Esplanade in the upper area of the town, field area with soccer field and basketball. In the area above there is a park and drinking water and going up the hill are the municipal facilities with a swimming pool, bar and showers. In summer you can shower and swim by paying a small amount. Starting point for excursions in the mountains.
